show_name: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc III - The Advent (movie)
other_title: Berserk: La Edad de Oro III - El advenimiento (Spanish)
Берсерк: Золотой век. Фильм III: сошествие (Russian)
ベルセルク 黄金時代篇Ⅲ 降臨 (Japanese)
plot: Guts and the remainder of the Band of the Hawk join forces once again to try to rescue Griffith from the depths of Midland. This is just the prelude of a nefarious ritual intended to brand the end of the Golden Age arc.
